content: **knitted mittens for christmas with nordic pattern in drops merino extra fine theme christmas** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-218 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m l/xl measurements circumference approx 21-23 cm length from beginning to end approx 23-24 cm length from after the rib to tip approx 18-19 cm length from thumb gusset to finger approx 11-12 cm length thumb from after thumb gusset to end approx 6 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-50 g colour 01 off white pattern colour 100-100 g colour 42 cedar base colour or use base colour 35 dark heather 37 misty forest 31 forest green **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch and nordic pattern = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 3 mm needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
